about: Join the celebration of RODZIEWICZ band's new album 'Muzyka Moja i Nasha' by playing one of our tracks! Whether you're using your phone screen, computer keyboard, or your favorite midicontroller (first note 36), get involved. Capture the moment in a video, share it on Instagram, and don't forget to tag @stevenashbeats and @yacekrodziewicz. By doing so, you'll have a chance to win a vinyl signed by the artists.
